greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Exponential of Mangoldt function conjugated by Tek's flip: a(n) = A225546(A014963(A225546(n))).
comment: Nonunit squarefree numbers take the value 2, other nonsquares take the value 1, and squares take the square of the value taken by their square root.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..65537
Index entries for sequences computed from exponents in factorization of n
Index entries for sequences related to prime signature
formula: If n = s^(2^k), s squarefree >= 2, k >= 0, then a(n) = 2^(2^k), otherwise a(n) = 1.
For n, k > 1, if a(n) = a(k) then a(A331590(n, k)) = a(n), otherwise a(A331590(n, k)) = 1.
a(n) = 1 if and only if A331591(n) <> 1, otherwise a(n) = 2^A051903(n).
xref: Sequences used in a definition of this sequence: A014963, A048298, A225546, A267116, A297108, A340676.
Positions of terms > 1: A340682, of terms > 2: A340674.
Sequences used to express relationship between terms of this sequence: A003961, A331590.
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_ and _Peter Munn_, Feb 01 2021
